text:
@Jim_Jordan Gym Jordan supports the man who says windmills cause cancer, we should irradiate the body with light to cure the coronavirus, and we should inject ourselves with disinfectant to also cure the coronavirus.
Gym Jordan is a waste of good oxygen.
